CustomField.description: Optional line description will be added to invoices, receipts, and detailed customer statements. If blank, the value of this field will match the value of the related item's "Receipt Description" field.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Optional line description will be added to invoices, receipts, and detailed customer statements. If blank, the value of this field will match the value of the related item's "Receipt Description" field.
CustomField.label: Line Description
